H0.text: The rate of photosynthesis may decrease as a negative effect of the buying and selling of a popular species of rainforest animal as pets on the rainforest ecosystem.

H1.text: There is a probability of genetic variability caused by the buying and selling of a popular species of rainforest animal as pets, which negatively impacts the rainforest ecosystem.

H2.text: The number of symbiotic relationships increases as a negative effect of buying and selling a popular species of rainforest animal as pets on the rainforest ecosystem.

H3.text: It could lead to the potential extinction of those animals when the buying and selling of a popular species of rainforest animal as pets has a negative effect on the rainforest ecosystem.

A4.text: Wildlife populations in Latin America and the Caribbean, including the Amazon, have declined by an average of 94% over the past 48 years.
